website_summaries.verdict: Gives beginners a good starting point when seeking a basic light box tracer at a very reasonable price.
pros: Average drawing surface size with dimensions roughly equal to A4 size paper
Very thin light box at about 0.19", so you can easily carry it with you wherever you need to use it
Runs on a USB connection, and the cord is included
Very easy to use, as it doesn't have any extra features
cons: Uses a diffusing layer that may dim the light too much for some applications

customer_reviews.title: Simple paper trick makes it perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this both for tracing patterns and for viewing X-rays (also from amazon). When it arrived I was disappointed because the light is covered in black dots as other reviewers have mentioned and shown photos of. However, we quickly realized that the light is bright enough to show through multiple layers of paper, so now we use it with a white sheet of paper and it works great. In the picture I attached, it’s on the dimmest of 3 brightness settings. We can even put an X-ray on the blank paper and then cover the X-ray with yet another sheet of paper for tracing the shape of the bones!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann

customer_reviews.title: Missing features
customer_reviews.text: Instructuions that came with light box says it dims and has an off switch. It has neither. Update: Seller was extremly responsive, sent out a new board with the correct featutes. Very happy with this seller. Will continue to buy from.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It is everything the description said it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 'weeding' my craft vinyl designs. Needed something light weight, portable, and not blindingly bright.
customer_reviews.author: Asariel

customer_reviews.title: Product worked great until I disconnected the cable from the table itself
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great until I disconnected the cable from the table itself. The entire apparatus came out. I have no idea how this even happened, as there is no way to fit it back in. Returning. Purchased a second one, thinking that the first problem was just a fluke! But this one broke when the port to plug it into went inside the light table and would no longer attach Tried to fix but whole thing fell out. DO NOT BUY. While I love the design, it's not electronically sound!
customer_reviews.author: D. McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Does not get bright due to mesh layer inside - stupid!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a terrible light pad. There is a layer of mesh inside that prevents the LED lights from getting bright white. Even at the highest level of brightness, the mesh makes it dull light. I could not see what I need to see to trace my line drawings on white paper. I have purchased 2 other brands of light pads, neither of them have this mesh layer. I do not see why it is inside this product, it's really stupid. I bought this as a gift for a student when it was on an Amazon Daily Deal, was very disappointed. Sending it back and asking for refund.
customer_reviews.author: krajecd

customer_reviews.title: 3 Brightness Settings was a Surprise to me
customer_reviews.text: Initial quality seems very good. I was shocked to see a dark difuser grid but pleasantly shocked to find it has three power settings for low medium and high light. At first it didn't seem bright enough as I tested it for my use. Then when I went to hit the power off it brightened up in intensity and again as I hit the power button. I will update the review if it decides to quite on me but for the price point and what I need it for it works.
customer_reviews.author: Walter S. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Not As Pictured and Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item because my other one didn't last long. The micro USB slot became loose-- as they often do-- so the cord is always super loose and the device can't stay on. So i bought this item, thinking it would be better made. I mean, it's listed as 60$-- significantly more pricey than the other one I bought-- but selling for 15$. I thought I had a good deal. Imagine my dismay when I opened up the box and saw that it's the same, cheap item I previously bought and not the one pictured.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Diamond Painting!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this Ultra Thin LED Light to anyone doing the hobby of Diamond Painting. The quality is excellent! I received it in record time! And the price is far better than any others I have researched. I understand that this is a family owned business...and what better way is there to support our hard working families!! I am also told that it works great with tracing paper (although I haven't tried it yet). I am sure there are many great uses for this very thin LED light. I know I absolutely love mine! Thank you for making my Diamond Painting so much more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such A Good Buy!!! So Glad I Bought It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thin and bright light "box". It has 3 brightness settings, which makes it flexible. I'm using it for applique. I draw a design and then put it on the light "box" (it's more like a sheet of glass) and trace it onto freezer paper or Steam A Seam II to transfer to fabric. It shines brightly through even the thicker layers of Steam A Seam II. I also used it to draw quilting patterns onto fabric, and it works so well. I really love it. It has to be plugged in to use, so I may also purchase the other one that charges for taking to workshops, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Oaks

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, Great Deal, Must Have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. So glad I got this for use with my vinyl cutter and heat press. I'm going to take my T Shirt business to the next level and the Light Box is going to be instrumental. Large work surface, three different brightness settings. I don't know how I worked before having this. Anyone out there with a vinyl cutter (Graphtec, Cricut, Shilouette, etc)? You know the eye strain trying to weed your designs without proper lighting. Having the light from the bottom will change your life forever.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only 2 short uses
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this. It is just the right size. But after only 2 uses The charging port (which is the universal charging cord) only powers on if it is positioned just right and the slightest movement turns it off. This is a problem because the light only powers on or off when plugged into a power source. It is not like a tablet or phone that can be charged for a few hours and then taken off the power source and be used, it has to have content electricity. Maybe I got a faulty product but Highly disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Zak Defelice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son's art college class
customer_reviews.text: My son is at an art college in Los Angeles and someone else at the college recommended he get this. He is living in the dorms and I just asked him how it was working for him. He said "perfect" "5 stars". So, I don't know all the details, but he is super happy and it's working well for him. I know there was a similar one that was more expensive so I had asked him before I ordered it, if this one (which was less expensive) was the one he wanted and he told me "yes"- that's what was recommended so that's what I ordered. Therefore, it comes highly recommended by more than one art college student!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Broken after barely using it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product November 28th of 2018, and it has seen very little use outside of simply sitting on my desk for animation work at home. By February 5th the product no longer works. The USB power connection only functions when you apply pressure 7 degrees downward on the connection while plugged in, otherwise it turns off. This means I can’t use it flat on a workstation, which is the only way I can utilize it properly. TLDR: It broke after 2 months of gentle, infrequent use.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to trace but especially family photos that I then colored and gave as gifts. Another use I decided was to trace photos of nephews , nieces, etc. and make them copies that they can color themselves to keep or to give to their friends. The main thing to keep in mind that I found was that you don't want to have overhead lighting: you won't be able to see the image otherwise. I highly recommend this item and their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: C. carter

customer_reviews.title: Author/cartoonists gives five star rating.
customer_reviews.text: Thin, portable, works great. I am an author, who is trying to market by creating cartoons of my characters for websites and social media. This saves me time on some of the background and same pose drawings. I can trace right on regular copy paper too, no need for tracing paper. Finished drawing gets inked and scanned to laptop. Love this light box.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother!! Portable LED Light Box Trace
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed when unboxing the Light Box Tracer, was it was covered with black dots. Right away, I knew that would lower the amount of light coming through. Then, after turning it on I found the amount of light coming in was not high even on the highest level. I recommended finding another product and passing this one by, I have used my only a hand full of times and it sits on the shelf collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing light
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what the description says. It works perfect and it is so easy to use. I sit on the couch and use it as a lap pad to draw and trace on. I absolutely recommend this product. We will be buying these for gifts for several people this year. If you don't know how to draw well, this product can help you trace pieces and then you can practice shading and coloring. I use this for all sorts of projects and I think it would be great for tattoo artists and many other artists alike out there. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: @influenstermom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and features
customer_reviews.text: This light pad works really well for tracing or seeing outlines through paper. I actually purchased it for weeding vinyl from my cutting machine, however, because of the "texture" of the lighting, It is less effective at being able to see the lines through the vinyl. Still, it is a great bargain for a light pad and something I will use quite a bit. Being that it is very thin and light, it is easy to store. I love the fact that it is LED so it does not get hot and uses less electricity than my old light box.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwormish Me

customer_reviews.title: The packaging it came in was really good. But the product doesn’t really do what I ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price is alright. The packaging it came in was really good. But the product doesn’t really do what I thought it would do! I use it to weed vinyl and it’s suppose to cause you to strain your eyes less and it makes it worse! I definitely wouldn’t get this again for my needs! And jt already has two spots on it and i just opened it.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: A4 Ultra Thin LED Light Box
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this light pad. I do Bible Journaling and I like it because the light goes all the way to the edge of the pad which makes it easier to slide it to the center of the Bible. Also, there aren't many electrical outlets in my craft room, and I was thrilled that it works plugged into a small power source that I carry in my purse to charge my cell phone. It worked for over two hours and the light was just as strong at the end of two plus hours as it was when I turned it on. The power source is a Halo Charge It 3000.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this tracer in April and it worked great for 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tracer in April and it worked great for 5 months. Starting a few weeks ago, the touch power button started acting odd (sometimes working, sometimes not, no difference in pressure of touch). This week, power cord became almost completely dislodged from the side and it no longer turns on. Very disappointed that this tracer had such a short lifespan. As for the picture, forgive the dust. This tracer otherwise did not leave my drafting table, and I tend to be a gentle person. I also previously had a tracer that lasted 8+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit surprised at how light and thin this is, but wow the display is great. Used with the Calligraphy tracing guides and it's easy to use. The brightness also surprised me with it's 3 settings. The only thing is how it's connected via the USB. It felt a bit tight when I tried to plug the cord into the slot on the LED, but it works. This is a lot better and also takes up less space than my kids playschool light-up desk. lol
customer_reviews.author: Pat K

customer_reviews.title: If your looking to weed vinyl, keep looking...
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product to weed glitter vinyl, and it was horrible. It did not show any cut lines at all! I ordered this from reading a couple other comments saying it was good for weeding vinyl. I'm not sure what they are smoking to see cut lines in the vinyl, but I will tell you this product does not get bright enough to show those lines.
customer_reviews.author: Candy D

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Compact!
customer_reviews.text: This little light pad is very handy for tracing, even with thicker paper. There are 3 brightness settings, and it's simple to use. Plug in the USB to a phone charger or computer, etc., and then push the power button once, twice, or three times for your preferred brightness. The fourth press will turn it off again. It's very slim and portable, though I would still treat it as a fragile piece of electronics, as I can easily see it breaking under too much stress.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Manahan

customer_reviews.title: Great size, but bought to view slides and grid pattern makes it difficult
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an expensive way to view photo slides. Setup is very easy and the size is great. However, there is a grid or dotted pattern that makes viewing a whole page of slides very difficult as it obscures so much. If it was just white without the grid pattern, it would be great. Also, the fact that the item is glass, doesn't inspire confidence that this is very portable...at least not without packing it back up in the box and packaging and even then, I would be worried. For my specific application, I am considering returning this due to the above factors.
customer_reviews.author: themosquito

customer_reviews.title: For the price it’s a winner
customer_reviews.text: It’s super thin, so it’s very easily damaged. My first one arrived cracked, so I had to return it for a new one. Compared to the professional models retailing at hundreds of dollars, this one works pretty well, but if your paper is too thick, it won’t. For my purposes, it’s great. It’s on the small side, and it could stand to be brighter, but for the price, you can’t ask for much more. Use masking tape to hold your papers in place because there’s no clip.
customer_reviews.author: Selkie

customer_reviews.title: Loose wiring. Don’t purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Plug cane loose after barely three months of having it. Obviously it’s not being used daily/over used. Plus, it could have been my miss, but it HAS to be plugged into USB to work. I thought it was just to charge. ALSO, company won't return phone calls/messages about their product.
customer_reviews.author: ACKXFAM

customer_reviews.title: Great for desktop use -Very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and brightness control on this extremely thin light box. It makes use very easy. Although it is not a rechargeable light box, and must be plugged in to a power source for use, making it less portable, it is very thin and every light weight making it very user friendly. The longer USB cable provided is great for desktop use near a PC or if you have an USB adapter for the cable that is supplied with the unit. I have used it for several projects already and have only had it for a couple weeks. This is definitely a great added item to my crafting room.
customer_reviews.author: Mama 4Frogs

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light box but had limited funds. I was a little Leary about what I might get seeing as this was so inexpensive compared to others, but I am very pleasantly surprised. It's perfect for my needs. I like that it has 3 light levels that are easily changed. It's very lightweight which is also a plus for me. The only thing I would change of i could, would be to make the power cord longer, but that's a minor thing. Seller has been very attentive, wanting to make sure I am happy with my purchase. Will shop with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Moggy K

customer_reviews.title: This is literally BRILLIANT!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! is lightweight, with three intensity settings makes this a great addition to my design studio. I am a graphic designer and work on several softwares (Adobe CC) and lots of apps in my iPad, but nothing replaces a real sheet of paper and good old pencil. But if you are not the best sketcher like me, you will need to trace and re-trace a couple of times while creating a logos, etc... I remember the enormous blocky light box I used in school, this is very portable and easy to use. I highly recommend it! :)
customer_reviews.author: BoxerMom

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice light pad, hower, the pinpoints of light are troublesome because they are so close the the surface of the tablet - no chance to diffuse. You can overcome this problem by placing a piece of vellum or tracing paper on top of the pad BEFORE adding the rest of your materials. In addition to tracing, we have been looking at old slides to see which we want to scan.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Fab product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the kiddo who loves to draw/create comics & cartoons of his own. Lately he has also gotten into dabbling with making some flip books too just for fun. Kiddo began enjoying this as soon as it arrived. We (both parents + kid himself) all immediately noticed huge improvements with the work he's done with use of the light box compared to prior work he's done without it. This is a great product for a great price that totally exceeded our expectations. We will definitely purchase again if or when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Efficient!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great little light pad! I have just started painting with watercolor but I can't draw to save my life lol. I wanted a light pad to be able to transfer images to watercolor paper in order to practice watercolor technique while also creating pieces that have more artistry than I am capable of creating on my own. Super lightweight, seems pretty durable for its usage and has multiple light settings that work great with thicker paper and best of all, super low price and definitely worth it. 10/10 recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a sleek and simple design, but it does what it advertises and that's it's massive value. Price for function means this thing is going to get a lot of mileage from me and likely something I'd quickly buy again if it dies. If I had one complaint, it's that at the brightest setting it struggles to see through thick Bristol, but in a decently lit room without a lot of direct lighting on the drawing area it's manageable. I highly recommend the product, it's simple, efficient, and powered by the numerous mini-usb chargers I have floating around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for diamond painting and tracing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for diamond painting projects and tracing. They work really well. I love how they are so thin and that you can adjust the brightness. I plug the cord into usb power bank so they are very convenient to use. I just wish they came with a protective case. I knew they didn’t so i wasn’t expecting it but I have since ordered one. The packaging they came in worked temporarily. I would definitely order again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 3D in VA

customer_reviews.title: Broke after using a few times...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a couple of years but I've used it a handful of times. Tonight I tried to plug in the cord to pulled right out of the light board. It's now useless. Shame because it worked for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Why didn't I buy this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I have been hemming and hawing on buying one of these ultra thin light tables for months. I am just starting to do those diamond paintings and saw a demo that made me think I really needed one to save my poor eyes! It came today (so I cannot rate durability yet), but it looks amazing! The light levels are really going to be helpful... and I can use it for calligraphy, and other artsy things I do where I need a bit more light or want to back light a grid. Seriously cannot believe I got this for such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: FramFram Minnesotan

customer_reviews.title: Daughter thinks I'm the best dad ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure she thought that before the light box showed up. But my daughter really likes the light box and says it was her favorite birthday gift. Granted she's only 13 and probably not the most technical artist etc.. So she hasn't had any of the complaints or any negative feedback that I've read on some of the reviews. If your child loves to draw, paint and do crafts. I'm sure this pad will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Love this light pad....
customer_reviews.text: If your addicted to diamond painting, you MUST have this light pad. The pad is so thin, lightweight and it has 3 levels of brightness. I have a small basket of diamond painting packs, so I have 3 of these light pads on hand for when my friends come over. They have all ordered one or more light pads as well. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia U

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and very affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit of a skeptic of these products, but had never owned one, so I figured I’d give it a try. Easy to use and perfect for what I’ve been wanting to do. Draw My own wildlife photos. Plus, it fits perfectly in my laptop bag. I mainly print 8.5 x 11, so this works out for me beautifully. Product doesnt feel cheap and the LED panel doesnt blind you, regardless of levels. For the price, Im actually very impressed and happy that I made the decision on buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Faulty power switch?
customer_reviews.text: The power switch is so sensitive the light shuts off and changes brightness seemingly at will. Pressing the power button doesn't work. Pressing anywhere along that end of the black strip sometimes works, but not always. There must be an electrical short or other malfunction with the one I received. I will be contacting the seller to request a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Pochciol

customer_reviews.title: USB mini power connector broke fast.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these light boxes for my art classroom. They only lasted about 3 months before the mini plug connectors got worn out. I tried using new cables but the problem was in the lightbox itself. This is very disappointing. The other features are good. But it doesn't work without power.
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Decent light pad, power cord is total junk
customer_reviews.text: I’m a calligrapher and use this light pad to work on envelopes. The light pad itself is fine; I wish it had an on/off switch instead of the touch button with three levels, because it will shut off if you accidentally brush across the power button with your arm. My biggest issue is that the USB power cord is complete junk- the end that goes into a USB port completely came apart after less than two months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Rose

customer_reviews.title: Brightening the future
customer_reviews.text: This item is SAVING MY LIFE! I recently decided to go back to school for graphic design. May exercises require copying material or images. This helps my, less than youthful, eyes see and duplicate everything perfectly. Used for Storyboarding, Typography, Art Appreciation, etc. Excellent item!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended brand by Amazon not working for me
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like Tikteck light board - I have bought 2 so far to compare. The first one gets really hot when I’m using it, and this 2nd one is not bright all the way through. Also, this light box was supposed to dim and have an off switch and it has neither. Will be returning both to Amazon. Very disappointed. Hopefully I can find one soon. Need for my hobbies.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea De Graff

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This light pad is a game changer for me and worth every penny! I use it to weed vinyl I’ve cut on my Silhouette Cameo and it works great. I love that there are three light levels and that it’s ultra thin. It’s pretty stylish looking so I just leave it on the corner of my desk and can grab it easily whenever I need it. It has a USB plug, but I use my Apple cube adapter and plug it into the wall. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a lightweight, portable light box. I wish I’d gotten one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Tina G.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best light board you will find! Five stars all the way I'd give it six if I could
customer_reviews.text: I love this light board it is top quality! I use it constantly and serves a dual purpose for me I sometimes use it as a night light. And still is as bright as when I first got it and does not seem to be getting dim like I've hand and heard of others doing. I would suggest to buy from this company because their product is absolutely the best out there as I've gone through two other light boards which failed on me after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicaj

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would last but only used it one time aftr buying it in Oct 2017 and the element you plug into it broke and pulled out of light box.'Unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F. D. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: I like how bright this lightbox is. I thought at first that the light was very dim, but you have to touch the power button three times to get the brightest light. It's like a 3-way touch lamp that's powered by a USB cable. The only thing I don't like about it is the cord placement. It gets in the way and I worry about damaging the cord where it protrudes away from the end of the lightbox. But I still like it enough to recommend it, but I would say buy a cord protector as well to keep the wires from breaking inside the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy R Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for acrylic painting on canvas so that I could trace designs. I had an old light that the edges were metal and the metal edges would get really hot to the touch. I was delighted when this one arrived and it isn't designed with metal edges. But that's about all the delight I have for this light. It works Ok, or just average. I agree with other reviews about the black dotted mesh or whatever that is. WTH?!! Why did they have to add that? The light doesn't get as bright as I want so now I'm looking around for another one now. Glad I didn't spend too much money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tracing diagrams and maps.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit because I had to trace some maps and diagrams for my work. The various brighness levels were great, and I found the unit bright enough for all of my needs. I had heard that the black dots interfered with the quality of the lighting, but I did not find this at all. I got it on sale, so the value was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy James Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this product. I'm old school, so was delighted with the thin, portable and different light selections. Use for weeding and tracing for art and quilt designs. Works well with all and can use the brightest setting for those dark fabrics. Sooo much better than holding up to the window. I can craft in the night now.
customer_reviews.author: K. Newell

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: For me this is a great size since most of art is smaller than US legal paper so it's great for my work. It's easy to store because it's so thin and the cord that comes attached is long enough so that if I decide to use my laptop as it's source it can be a good ways away from me and still connect to the light box. The 3 light settings I don't really use I just go for the last setting and I've used it at most for an hour and half and it doesn't get hot on me or shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great gift for my son who loves tracing and drawing flip books! We bought a case to put it in for perfection when he's not using it, but this light has been used multiple times in 2 months and has held up awesome! I read hours worth of reviews before choosing this one and I'm glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Quilters! Makes Paper Piecing a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: This is the deal of the century for quilters! I LOVE this for paper piecing. The adjustable brightness is really great! It's so lightweight and portable. Excellent value and it serves a fabulous purpose in the sewing studio!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: I like it over all.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. its. Very light it has 3 light settings. Low medium and extra bright. It's a nice size not to small and not to big. The only thing Is that you have to have it plugged in to work but I dont mind good thing I have a plug near my desk. Over all i really really like it. Oh it's not for children in my eyes I less they are very careful it seems like it can break easily or get punctured. Hope you all enjoy like I will.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, easy on eyes, portable, thin, just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light pad! The variable brightness is convenient for different paper thicknesses. The black mesh pattern built into the pad makes it easy on the eyes. It’s super lightweight yet sturdy and very portable. The only “downside” (which may be nitpicking) would be the brightness button is touch sensitive, so I often bump it when I’m tracing and have to change it back to my preferred brightness. This small issue would not be a dealbreaker. If anything happened to this light pad, I would definitely buy another one and I would still highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: plug in port issues
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this lightbox several times and the port to receive the power cord is not built solid enough to withstand pushing in the power cord and is now bent out of shape. I would recommend manufacturer incorporate a more stable port.
customer_reviews.author: C BENTSON

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price! Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super tool for artists who need a light board. Easy to use, perfect size, uses USB wire for power and three light intensity settings. I have only had it a few weeks but so far with a couple uses to create tracings from photos to transpose to watercolor paper it’s been fabulous. Very light weight! I hope this is durable - and have to find something to protect it well, like a case. Until then I am using the slim box it came in. Highest setting works well for average weight paper.
customer_reviews.author: WenonahT

customer_reviews.title: Got a super Dud.
customer_reviews.text: Can't even get it to turn on. I bought a referbished version, and it didn't come with a power cord... Which shouldn't have been an issue, because I should be able to use *any* Universal USB to power it. I don't know why, but that didn't work. No power makes a light board pretty useless. I bought a second board new, and that one is working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: WhetzelMomma

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for weeding vinyl, card stock, htv, etc. when you can’t see all the little details. Just place your project right on top of the light plate and turn it on. It can connect to anything with its USB port and has three different levels of brightness so you can see. 10/10 highly recommend to anyone who makes projects with a die cutting machine. Bought this as a gift for someone and am about to buy one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: mikayla

customer_reviews.title: This light box is better quality than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: This light box is better quality than I imagined. It's about as thin as a popsicle stick, has three light level settings with smooth, even LED light, the power button is flush with the unit and powers on/ cycles through settings with a light tap, and I can plug it right into my laptop or a usb wall socket.. it's really nice! I looked around other places for light boxes first, and most places only have big bulky plastic boxes with standard outlets, uneven or incandescent light, and those units are upwards of $80 to well into the 100s.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremysart

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: This light pad is exactly what I needed to trace some drawings for my work. It has 3 light levels and works well with both the included tracing paper as well as regular paper. I have not had it a long time, so I cannot comment on durability, but it seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a lasting product
customer_reviews.text: I have had it less then a month and today it won’t turn on. Absolutely ridiculous. I only used it for maybe 14 hours over the past month. No blue light either
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ludlow

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, portable, bright, affordable
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for my 5D diamond paintings! I can actually see where the little dots are and am able to make straight lines because of it. My work turns out looking a lot neater and more professional because of it. It's very light weight, portable, and you can adjust the brightness depending on how light it is in your work area. The only thing I would improve on is letting it hold a charge instead if needing to be plugged in to work. I can only use it by an outlet, so it limits where I can work on projects. Overall great product though! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: ShellySea

customer_reviews.title: Great for the hard to see projects
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our Diamond Painting projects as we have already reached the top of the hill and slowly getting down the other side where things start to leave us IE sight hearing etc. Anyway these are great lightweight lights that really help with art projects Shipping was super and can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: levans

customer_reviews.title: Changed my sketching- so good
customer_reviews.text: This works great and has changed my sketching. Thin enough to work well under moleskin notebook pages and varying brightness levels is handy. Can put croquis under paper and sketch without having to worry about proportions. Usually plug into wall vs computer (usb end plugs into my ipad plug) and cord is nice length- not too long to be a pain transporting but long enough to give space when plugged in. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: smookk

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The light box is very lightweight and easy to use. My husband, after reading other reviews of this light box, applied tape to the cord to hold it firmly in place. So far so good on our end. I am very gentle when using it and because of the tape do not pull the cord out after each use. We plug it into a computer to power it. I use it for copying photos and drawings. Works great. TikTeck shipped out the item very quickly, have been friendly and communicative.
customer_reviews.author: icanknit

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: I received this product on time and very quickly. Upon opening it I was very pleased on how thin the light box was as well as how light. It barely feels like you're carrying anything at all when you're transporting it. I like how easy it is to use as well. You just plug it in and press the power button on the left hand corner. The light box also has three light intensity options which are great! Overall a great product, easy to use, extremely portable, good quality, and easy to store! I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: dominique diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Thin! Easy to use. Plugs in to a USB so you can plug into your computer or a plug in the wall. Does such a great job of helping me to weed my vinyl projects. Bought this one in lieu of a $80 brand name one and this does everything I expected and more!!! 3 brightness settings so I can get started fully bright and then I can back off the intensity once I have some spots pulled out. It’s fantastic! Can’t say enough good things!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Manley

customer_reviews.title: Black dots over light????
customer_reviews.text: The black dotted grid is such a disappointment! What the heck??? Makes tracing, even at the highest setting, very difficult. Gave this two stars because it is well-made, well-priced, and very portable.... But when you are buying a LIGHT TABLE, why would you cover the work space with a zillion black dots??
customer_reviews.author: Holly M.

customer_reviews.title: Great light box
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this before. Tried to save a penny and jerry rigged a light box. How did that work? Not very good. Saw the listing on this box and the price and ordered it right then and love it. It has 3 levels of brightness, is very sturdy and came very packed. I would highly recommend this light box. Very good service from the seller. Sharon
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: So bright!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I read all the reviews before I decided to go with this light pad. I’ve seen many other light pads but decided to choose this one due to the fact that when you press the button again and again it goes brighter which is really good for my eyes! So far it’s been working very well. Came in so quick, I didn’t realize it was so thin, Ives used it twice already for tracing my patterns and it’s so easy instead of holding up to the window.
customer_reviews.author: forevablessed13

customer_reviews.title: NOT PORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I do like this light box however the word portable does not exist for the slide box because you can’t you have to leave it plugged in you can’t unplug it without it not working and I have to constantly constantly be plugged in while you’re working on it which is not portable.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lane

customer_reviews.title: Slippery and must be anchored to work with easily
customer_reviews.text: Nice light box. Compared to even the ones made 5-6 years ago. This one is portable and light. It is also slippery and very easy to drop. It slides off pretty much anything except a perfectly level position. It's difficult to draw on simply because of that. I had to tape everything down. If your doing drawings that require any movement.....good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy52

customer_reviews.title: Really like the 3 brightness levels and size
customer_reviews.text: I bought the item to view transparencies/slides and as a background light source for scanning them. I was unaware that the light source was not homogeneous but, discontinuous - sort of linear row pixelated. Placing the the tracing paper that came with the device on the platen did not provide any improvement but copy paper did. The colors are not true when scanning but I intend to try other scattering media - maybe opal glass will work. I am quite satisfied - can be used for many other illumination uses. If nothing else the grand kids can use it for tracing. May purchase another (maybe larger) just for them.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Marak Simcik

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. The button sensitivity is perfect. My tracing and reference use in general has immensely improved. The only complaint I have is that the connections seem like they're going to break in the future, but I've been taking good care of it
customer_reviews.author: A more palatable name

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright while super slim!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! I read other reviews (as I always do before a purchase) and learned about the small dots over the screen so that wasn’t a surprise, however what did suprise me was that they do not hinder the usage at all! I love the three different light levels and it’s so easy to use! I cannot believe how thin this thing is! Crazy! But super awesome! I might have to order a second one for the kids as they keep trying to take mine hahaha!
customer_reviews.author: Cheerfuljuice

customer_reviews.title: For quilting patterns
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. It works well for tracing quilting patterns onto fabric. The brightest setting works well even through medium color fabric. My quilting group was amazed at how thin and portable it is. Being so thin and lightweight, it looks fragile so I will be making a protective case for it but in the meantime, it came well packed in a protective box. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Fresh.Handmade

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic item, especially for the price! As an illustration major, I constantly need to clean up my work to transfer and this is much bigger than my other light box. The "black dots" are irrelevant, they make no difference to the light coming through and this thing gets BRIGHT. You're not staring at the dots, your looking at your work that's placed on top. Great product, would buy many times over!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: great light box, fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: it works great. the adjustable light is easy for days when your eyes are more sensitive. so far i have had no eye strain. it can plug into any adapter like your cell phone, tablet or lap top. extremely light weight, thin, so thin that its not in your way for creating.. it doesnt have a protective cover or storage box/bag. other than that the price is great and it work very well. i am so happy with my light box.
customer_reviews.author: Angel P.

customer_reviews.title: 3 brightness settings that reveal even pencil through cardstock paper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to be able to clean up sketches and logo designs. Pros: -There are three different brightness settings, all which show even pencil through cardstock (thicker) paper. (you just need to press the power button a second and third time to select the other brightness settings) -It is extremely slim and lightweight which makes it easy to transport. -Easy to use - I just plug in the usb cord into my computer and press the power button to start using it. Cons: -I don't really have any cons. I do get nervous about it cracking if i do anything wrong because of it's slim size, but i would say overall, that is a positive feature.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Dooman

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an aid for my graphic design projects and it works perfectly for what I need! I looked into various light boxes and most were big and bulky and so I loved that this one was compact and portable. It is so thin, yet feels sturdy. The light is bright enough to push through heavy cardstock which is great. The price on it was phenomenal compared to others that were way more expensive for the same concept. I strongly suggest this item for those looking for a travel friendly light board
customer_reviews.author: Amy G.

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT for embroidery
customer_reviews.text: This super slim light pad is PERFECT for crafting, stitching, etc! It doesn't take up any space to store, is a great price, and has 3 light settings. The brightest one makes tracing even colored images a breeze. SUPER happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Williams

customer_reviews.title: Budding artist Joy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this light pad. She has been drawing non stop since we received it. At the price point I didn't expect much but it has exceeded my expectations so far.
customer_reviews.author: HottleC

customer_reviews.title: Helps with weeding for my new Cricut
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend a lot of money to by the official lightpad for Cricut, but I quickly realized I needed something to help with weeding. I bought this at a lower price than the official pad, and I can now see the lines from the cuttings. It makes it a lot easier to weed out the excess pieces.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great Light box, but wiring or circuiting is too weak.
customer_reviews.text: It's light and super portable. I don't really need all the different light intensities. I always use the brightest one. The reason I gave it 3 stars is the place where you input the power, it broke. I've been using it for 8 months now for work. I don't use it daily. Possibly a few handful of times within the month. I have to fiddle around the cord to find the right "sweet spot" and then try and use it delicately as possible. Might try to fix it myself, but I probably will purchase the same or similar light box again if I can't fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Juli Kyun

customer_reviews.title: Love this lightbox!
customer_reviews.text: My previous light box was very clunky, about 3-4" high, and I always had to use it standing at a counter because I could not use it at a table. This one I can use anywhere and I like being able to adjust the brightness. For those who freak out over the dots, they disappear when you lay a piece of paper over them.
customer_reviews.author: Pageturner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for weeding very small vinyl projects!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light board for weeding vinyl. I purchased this for my daughter, she does a great deal of tiny vinyl work. This board does an incredible job helping her to see the edges of the cut vinyl. The board is the perfect size to transport, easy to pack up to take to shows, etc.. The light is bright. This picture really doesn't do the board justice, because it's difficult to photograph the cut vinyl, but it gives you an idea of how the board helps. Absolutely love this board!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Webster

customer_reviews.title: A great gift idea!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item was a birthday present for my 9 year old granddaughter. She was real excited about it, plugged it in and started using it right away. She loves to draw and design things. So tracing different parts of different items then putting them all together she has her own idea. I will be buying from you again
customer_reviews.author: hvcgn

customer_reviews.title: This is SO cool! doesn’t seem possible that it could work as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is SO cool! doesn’t seem possible that it could work as it just appears to be a piece of glass but it perhaps works! Very nicely packaged with a couple of little “extras.“ Highly recommended. I am sad to say that after having used this almost weekly for five months, it has stopped working. What started as a flimsy connection has stopped working entirely. This is still a fascinating product and if you only need it for short time the price is Well worth it. I have updated my stars from 5 to 2 for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: lkana

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry you bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to copy embroidery designs onto fabric stabilizers to transfer to my projects. It works fantastic! I love it has 3 different light levels because I use clear and opaque stabilizers. The price was good and it is so light and easy to store. I use a power pack so the cord length doesn't apply for me.
customer_reviews.author: danid

customer_reviews.title: Connection for cord
customer_reviews.text: Giving it an overall 2 stars, It was great the first day until the connection part to where the cord plugs into the light pad doesn’t hold the cord in anymore, it slips right out. Company needs to redesign the plug in part to make it a tighter fit
customer_reviews.author: Frank H Mason Jr

customer_reviews.title: Superb!!! Totally recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. It comes with transparent drawing paper and eraser too. It’s very bright, the camera does it no justice and it has a moderately long usb micro cable. I added an extension as well but you may not need one. I’d like to see a version of this with a Rechargeable battery, it can’t be that hard to do and still have a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Silva

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Fair, though I wish it did get a little brighter. The picture attached is it on the brightest setting through a sheet of notebook paper and Arches watercolor paper. The weird glowing spots are my fault, I got gesso on it. I like that I can carry it in my bag and use a portable charger with it.
customer_reviews.author: Iddun wanna

customer_reviews.title: Lightpad is a must
customer_reviews.text: I use this light pad all the time when working on my calligraphy pieces. It saves me so much effort from having to draw guidelines and erase. I like that the cord detaches so it's easy to store but I don't like that it has a USB charger. It's easy to fix by plugging it into my wall charger with a USB port.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It's Not Portable
customer_reviews.text: This light box is okay. The description states that it's portable but that's not really accurate. It has to be plugged into a computer or a wall outlet because the light box itself doesn't store power at all. It is thin, and has multiple brightness settings but it's just a pain to have to sit by an outlet to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Danie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting!
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect for moms DIY Diamond paintings! It shines through showing her the numbers easily. Using a lamp, there's always a glare. I bought this with a stand for her and its made her hobby so much more enjoyable. Its a little small so can't use it with her large pictures, and wish the power button wasnt on the front, she kept leaning her arm on it turning it off and on. Also you can use a simple cell phone charger to plug it up. Comes with a USB cord.
customer_reviews.author: Impress Me

customer_reviews.title: light is uneven
customer_reviews.text: This is thin and lightweight and a good size, however the light gets dimmer as you move to the right. Also did not notice the 'dots' in the background or that it only has 3 levels of light. That was my fault but just an FYI to pay close attention to description and pictures given. Major issue was the uneven lighting on the board itself. Did not expect that.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light box especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Awesome light box especially for the price. I was worried since it is EXTREMELY thin, however it is very bright and easily works even on my 140 lb Arches watercolor paper. I am impressed. I would consider buying a larger size in the future if it is available. BONUS: I am able to use this light box by plugging it in to my phone charger which is already at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Diane
